mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'T' THEN 1 END) AS TEMP_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'S' THEN 1 END) AS STANDBY_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'P' THEN 1 END) AS PROGRESS_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'E' THEN 1 END) AS END_COUNT FROM JOB_RECRUITMENT WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo}

SELECT RECRUITMENT_NO, BUSINESS_NO, TITLE, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_DEPT, METHOD, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DEADLINE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DEADLINE, STATUS FROM JOB_RECRUITMENT WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND STATUS = 'P'

SELECT RECRUITMENT_NO, BUSINESS_NO, TITLE, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_DEPT, METHOD, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DEADLINE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DEADLINE, STATUS FROM JOB_RECRUITMENT WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND STATUS = 'S'

SELECT RECRUITMENT_NO, BUSINESS_NO, TITLE, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_DEPT, METHOD, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DEADLINE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DEADLINE, STATUS FROM JOB_RECRUITMENT WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND STATUS = 'T'

SELECT RECRUITMENT_NO, BUSINESS_NO, TITLE, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_DEPT, METHOD, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(DEADLINE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DEADLINE, STATUS FROM JOB_RECRUITMENT WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND STATUS = 'E'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL, COUNT(CASE WHEN RESUME_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 END) AS VIEW_COMPLETE, COUNT(CASE WHEN RESUME_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 END) AS VIEW_NOT_FINISHED, COUNT(CASE WHEN SCORE IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS EVALUATION_COMPLETE, COUNT(CASE WHEN PASS_STATUS = 'P' THEN 1 END) AS PASS_TOTAL FROM APPLICANTS WHERE RECRUITMENT_NO = #{recruitmentNo}

SELECT P.POSITION_NO AS POSITION_NO, P.RECRUITMENT_NO AS RECRUITMENT_NO, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_RANK, RECRUITED_PEOPLE, COUNT(CASE WHEN RESUME_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 END) AS VIEW_PEOPLE, COUNT(CASE WHEN SCORE IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS EVALUATION_PEOPLE, COUNT(CASE WHEN PASS_STATUS = 'P' THEN 1 END) AS PASS_PEOPLE FROM POSITION P JOIN APPLICANTS A ON (P.POSITION_NO = A.POSITION_NO) WHERE A.RECRUITMENT_NO = #{recruitmentNo}

SELECT B.BUSINESS_NO AS BUSINESS_NO, B.RESUME_NO AS RESUME_NO, B.FOLDER_NO AS FOLDER_NO, USER_NAME AS APPLICANTS_NAME, USER_PIC AS APPLICANTS_PICTURE, USER_PHONE AS APPLICANTS_PHONE, USER_EMAIL AS APPLICANTS_EMAIL, NVL(FOLDER_NAME, '미분류') AS FOLDER_NAME, A.RESUME_STATUS, CASE WHEN A.RESUME_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS APPLICANTS_HISTORY, CASE WHEN A.RESUME_NO IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(A.APPLICANTS_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') ELSE NULL END AS APPLICANTS_DATE, ADD_DATE FROM BUSINESS_BOOKMARK B JOIN RESUME R ON (B.RESUME_NO = R.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN APPLICANTS A ON (R.RESUME_NO = A.RESUME_NO) LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_FOLDER F ON (B.FOLDER_NO = F.FOLDER_NO) WHERE B.BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} ORDER BY B.ADD_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUSINESS_FOLDER (FOLDER_NO, BUSINESS_NO, FOLDER_NAME, FOLDER_ORDER) VALUES (NULL, #{businessNo}, #{folderName}, NULL)
